document.full_text: deutsche boerse  has no plans to raise its $10.2 billion bid for nyse euronext , confident the benefits of its deal will trump a higher offer from rival u.s. exchanges, a source familiar with the deal said.
document.title: confident d.boerse will not raise nyse bid: source
lines_and_colors: deutsche boerse  has no plans to raise its $10.2 billion bid for nyse euronext , confident the benefits of its deal will trump a higher offer from rival u.s. exchanges, a source familiar with the deal said.
